content: free pattern at the link above is in **english only** *effortlessly stylish cap available in regular or slouchy fit for men or women knit in patons kroy socks patons yarns * sizes to fit average lady man version 1 regular fit version 2 slouchy fit materials patons® kroy socks 50 g/1 75 oz 152 m/166 yds **version 1** regular fit lady man 55048 grey brown ragg or 55102 blue striped ragg 1 1 ball s **version 2** slouchy fit lady man 2 2 ball s sizes 3 25 mm u s 3 and 3 75 mm u s 5 circular knitting needles 16 40 cm long and set of four size 3 75 mm u s 5 double-pointed knitting needles slouchy fit version is the same as regular fit but is worked 11 inches before top shaping written instructions are provided in pdf download august 2011
